metadata.how_to_trigger: - goto -113.81, 37.42, 616.04- pass the skillchecks with Salazon- speak to him again after that to trigger scene

0.speaker: Salazon
0.text: Said you could pass, didn't I?
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Salazon is crouching behind shelves, focused on the entrance. Impatient, wanting to get back to his taskNodeContext: Salazon is crouching behind shelves, focused on the entrance. Impatient, wanting to get back to his task

1.speaker: Salazon
1.text: Said your friend could pass - goes for you too.
